name: vw-ui
description: Mobile web UI Components based on Vue2 and WeUI.

scripts.dev: npm run bootstrap && npm run build:entry && cooking watch -c build/cooking.demo.js -p
scripts.dist-old: npm run bootstrap && npm run clean && npm run build:entry && npm run lint && cooking build -c build/cooking.conf.js,build/cooking.common.js,build/cooking.component.js -p
scripts.dist: npm run bootstrap && npm run clean && npm run build:entry && cooking build -c build/cooking.conf.js,build/cooking.common.js,build/cooking.component.js -p
scripts.deploy: npm run build:entry && cooking build -c build/cooking.demo.js -p && gh-pages -d example/dist --remote eleme

author: Jay.M.Hu <hm910705@163.com>
